Phraseology: recorded on a net basis (cf. financial account transactions)

Because the focus of economic statistics is on a single economy , a legal entity may be split into separate institutional units for statistical purposes . The step is taken because each of the parts has such a strong connection with the economic territory in which it is located that it should be considered as part of that economy .  (IMF 2009 4.20)
The ~ing form is a verbal form
